summary: **Beavis and Butt-Head** is an American animated TV show created by Mike Judge. It's about two lazy teenagers, Beavis and Butt-Head, who love rock music and often get into silly adventures in their town. The show is funny and sometimes makes fun of society. It became very popular on MTV in the 1990s and even had two movies made. The characters became famous, especially for their funny laughs and weird talk. The show came back a few times and will have new episodes on Comedy Central in 2025.
title: Beavis and Butt-Head
